verses.verse: And he showed <S%H7200><s%> me Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and Satan <S%H7854><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> to resist <S%H7853><s%> him.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Satan, <S%H7854><s%> The LORD <S%H3068><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> you, O Satan; <S%H7854><s%> even the LORD <S%H3068><s%> that has chosen <S%H977><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> rebuke <S%H1605><s%> you: is not this <S%H2088><s%> a brand <S%H181><s%> plucked <S%H5337><s%> out of the fire? <S%H784><s%>
Now Joshua <S%H3091><s%> was clothed <S%H3847><s%> with filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments, <S%H899><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the angel. <S%H4397><s%>

And he answered <S%H6030><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to those that stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, saying, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> the filthy <S%H6674><s%> garments <S%H899><s%> from him. And to him he said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have caused your iniquity <S%H5771><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> from you, and I will clothe <S%H3847><s%> you with change <S%H4254><s%> of raiment. <S%H4254><s%>

And I said, <S%H559><s%> Let them set <S%H7760><s%> a fair <S%H2889><s%> turban <S%H6797><s%> on his head. <S%H7218><s%> So they set <S%H7760><s%> a fair <S%H2889><s%> turban <S%H6797><s%> on his head, <S%H7218><s%> and clothed <S%H3847><s%> him with garments. <S%H899><s%> And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> by.
And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> protested <S%H5749><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts; <S%H6635><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you will walk <S%H3212><s%> in my ways, <S%H1870><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> you will keep <S%H8104><s%> my charge, <S%H4931><s%> then you shall also <S%H1571><s%> judge <S%H1777><s%> my house, <S%H1004><s%> and shall also <S%H1571><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> my courts, <S%H2691><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you places to walk <S%H4108><s%> among <S%H996><s%> these <S%H428><s%> that stand <S%H5975><s%> by.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> O Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest, <S%H3548><s%> you, and your fellows <S%H7453><s%> that sit <S%H3427><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: for they are men <S%H582><s%> wondered <S%H4159><s%> at: for, behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> forth <S%H935><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%> the BRANCH. <S%H6780><s%>

For behold <S%H2009><s%> the stone <S%H68><s%> that I have laid <S%H5414><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Joshua; <S%H3091><s%> on one <S%H259><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> shall be seven <S%H7651><s%> eyes: <S%H5869><s%> behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will engrave <S%H6605><s%> the engraving <S%H6603><s%> thereof, said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> and I will remove <S%H4185><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of that land <S%H776><s%> in one <S%H259><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

In that day, <S%H3117><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> shall you call <S%H7121><s%> every man his neighbor <S%H7453><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the vine <S%H1612><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> the fig <S%H8384><s%> tree.
